desc.p: Fields REPORT.NAME to LINE.NO.END form a related multi value set. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 21 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the RE.STAT.REPORT.HEAD file.
This is a multi valued field. This is a sub valued language field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
